Keywords: Armor , Fantastic Four , Future , Past , Scientist
Real Name: Nathaniel Richards
Special Powers
GENIUS INTELLECT AND SKILLED INVENTOR: FREE: If Nathaniel Richards is holding or adjacent to an object, remove that object from the game. If you do, choose Nathaniel Richards or an adjacent friendly character and a standard attack power. The chosen character can use the chosen power until your next turn.
ADVANCED TELEPORTATION DEVICE: Phasing/Teleport, Passenger: 2.
MY ARMOR IS MY OWN CREATION: Energy Shield/Deflection, Toughness.
